metadataAttributes.Title: Key Concepts in Organizational DE&I
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Key Concepts in Organizational DE&I is the second course of a four-course series and explores the foundational principles of DE&I and how they often impact decision-making within organizations. While these concepts are common, this course presents them through the unique lens of an equal opportunity professional with experience resolving complaints of discrimination and delivering DE&I programming to influence organizational culture and policy.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Richard Anthony Baker, J.D., M.P.A, Ph.D.
